Unique Stocking Stuffers For Men Universal Socket

We are a professional hardware manufacturer with over 30 years of experience who pursues to create a safe living space and bring safety and comfort for everyone in daily life.

The Universal Socket Set is suitable for everyone who needs it, whether you are a professional or an average person.

The Magical Grip Socket instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, hooks, eye and lag screws, bolt heads, and other various shape and size objects. This universal socket can be used in the automotive industry, home maintenance, manufacturing, construction and other industries.

One Size Fits Most Super Universal Socket

The universal socket fits both standard 1/4 to 3/4 inch and metric 7 to 9 mm nuts and bolts.

It can also grasp any shape nut,such as wing nut,hook nut,flange nut,hex nuts, square nuts, crew eyes, tension screws, bolt heads, even worn and damaged heads!

Upgraded Much Stronger Socket Tool

We use 54 super strong steel rods that are individually spring actuated allowing the socket to automatically conform to any shape instantly.

Move to different types of fasteners without every changing sockets!

No need to hunt a socket. This covers most sizes and Works on stripped bolts and odd shapes ones too.

Satisfy Your Different Needs

The 3/8″ adapter included turns any power drill instantly into a power socket driver.

This universal socket is perfect for home improvement, construction, carpentry, auto repair, and other household maintenance.

Read more

Great Time Saver Tool Gifts

The universal socket allows for going from fastener to another seamlessly.

This is perfect for auto repair and no more stopping, searching, and switching for the correct socket.

Easy to Carry Dad Gifts

HELEMAN socket set delivers accurate appliance and extended bolts compatibility suitable for any kind of repair work.

Keep it in your car, boat, bike, backpack, tackle box, or back pocket!

Perfect Gifts for DIYer

Professional self adjusting universal repair tools.Can be used in household maintenance, and construction

Offer this handy universal socket tool to any DIY enthusiast friend and they will definitely appreciate it.

Read more

(as of Nov 29,2022 03:32:51 UTC – Details)

From the brand

With hundreds of different brands coming out every day, it’s easy to get stuck in a rut. In search of a breakthrough point, Coquimbo pursues the development of high quality products to please consumers with superior products and excellent after-sales service. We focus on developing led work light, which will be different from traditional work light in that it has more features for use. We aim to make better products for our users.

Compact & Portable

Meticulous Work

Emergency Lighting

Nighttime Car Repair

Durable Material: This led work light is made of hard rubber, anti-sweat and anti-slip, the head is aluminum which dissipates the heat effectively, prolong the life of the lamp. Thanks to the foldable design, the lamp is easy to carry, and save storage space
5 Modes & Rechargeable: Built-in rechargeable battery, rechargeable by USB port ( included usb cable), you don’t need to buy another battery, this will save you cost, time and effort. has 5 Lighting modes: High Brightness / Medium Brightness / Front Light / Red Warning / Strobe Red.(long press the switch button to switch to red light modes)
360 Degree Rotary, Magnet Base & Hook: 360 degree rotate provide multi-angle illumination, magnet base and hook make your hand free to do other things in the night. It can be used for BBQ, camping, reading, car repair and any other things you would want to do at night.
Portable and Versatility: It’s very compact at 5.8″ folded and mere 4.9 oz in weight (140 gr), They’re small enough that they can fit in many different places. 3 white light modes can be use as a flashlight, work light, grill light, 2 red light modes can be use as an alert light.
What You Get: Package included 2 Rechargeable Work Light and 2 USB cable. It is a practical tool can use on daily time and outdoor active, It also can be used as a gift for friend or family member.

4.5
